name: 4X4 Top SUVs Climbing Hill Top Racing Game
name_original: 4X4 Top SUVs Climbing Hill Top Racing Game
description:
Need a SUV to climb up the mountain, wear your seat belt and gear up. 4X4 Top SUVs Climbing Hill will provide you with an extreme car driving experience.
Encourages you to push the SUVs power to full on these rocky and bumpy hills.
With numerous top SUVs to drive, the game gives a soothing scenic experience with beautiful stretched hills, dense clouds and amazing ambiance.
Player can level up different cars by earning coins. Keep record of the challenging distance covered for each track. Offers in apps to remove ads, so the player can have a smooth non stoppable playable experience.
Few additional attractions include:
• easy controls for car manipulation
• exciting graphics
• numerous vehicle upgrades
Nice yet challenging ultimate 2d driving experience and don’t forget to turn the music on for a real driving venture. Keep your car stable else the bomb explodes.
